1: קָרַ֤עְתָּ <sup>7167 </sup> <n>that thou wouldest rend</n> שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>the heavens</n> יָרַ֔דְתָּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>that thou wouldest come down</n> מִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>at thy presence</n> הָרִ֥ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>that the mountains</n> נָזֹֽלּוּ׃ <sup>2151 </sup> <n>might flow down</n>
2: כִּקְדֹ֧חַ <sup>6919 </sup> <n>burneth</n> אֵ֣שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>fire</n> הֲמָסִ֗ים <sup>2003 </sup> <n>As [when] the melting</n> מַ֚יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>causeth the waters</n> תִּבְעֶה־ <sup>1158 </sup> <n>to boil</n> אֵ֔שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>the fire</n> לְהוֹדִ֥יעַ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>known</n> שִׁמְךָ֖ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>to make thy name</n> לְצָרֶ֑יךָ <sup>6862 </sup> <n>to thine adversaries</n> מִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>at thy presence</n> גּוֹיִ֥ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>[that] the nations</n> יִרְגָּֽזוּ׃ <sup>7264 </sup> <n>may tremble</n>
3: בַּעֲשׂוֹתְךָ֥ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>When thou didst</n> נוֹרָא֖וֹת <sup>3372 </sup> <n>terrible things</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> נְקַוֶּ֑ה <sup>6960 </sup> <n>[which] we looked</n> יָרַ֕דְתָּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>not for thou camest down</n> מִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>at thy presence</n> הָרִ֥ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>the mountains</n> נָזֹֽלּוּ׃ <sup>2151 </sup> <n>flowed down</n>
4: וּמֵעוֹלָ֥ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>For since the beginning of the world</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>or</n> שָׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>[men] have not heard</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>or</n> הֶאֱזִ֑ינוּ <sup>238 </sup> <n>nor perceived by the ear</n> עַ֣יִן <sup>5869 </sup> <n>neither hath the eye</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>or</n> רָאָ֗תָה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>seen</n> אֱלֹהִים֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>O God</n> זוּלָ֣תְךָ֔ <sup>2108 </sup> <n>beside</n> יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>thee [what] he hath prepared</n> לִמְחַכֵּה־ <sup>2442 </sup> <n>for him that waiteth</n> לֽוֹ׃
5: פָּגַ֤עְתָּ <sup>6293 </sup> <n>Thou meetest</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שָׂשׂ֙ <sup>7797 </sup> <n>him that rejoiceth</n> וְעֹ֣שֵׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and worketh</n> צֶ֔דֶק <sup>6664 </sup> <n>righteousness</n> בִּדְרָכֶ֖יךָ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>thee in thy ways</n> יִזְכְּר֑וּךָ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>[those that] remember</n> הֵן־ <sup>2005 </sup> <n>Behold</n> אַתָּ֤ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>You</n> קָצַ֙פְתָּ֙ <sup>7107 </sup> <n>behold thou art wroth</n> וַֽנֶּחֱטָ֔א <sup>2398 </sup> <n>for we have sinned</n> בָּהֶ֥ם עוֹלָ֖ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>in those is continuance</n> וְנִוָּשֵֽׁעַ׃ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>and we shall be saved</n>
6: וַנְּהִ֤י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have become</n> כַטָּמֵא֙ <sup>2931 </sup> <n>But we are all as an unclean</n> כֻּלָּ֔נוּ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>for all</n> וּכְבֶ֥גֶד <sup>899 </sup> <n>rags</n> עִדִּ֖ים <sup>5708 </sup> <n>[are] as filthy</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> צִדְקֹתֵ֑ינוּ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>[thing] and all our righteousnesses</n> וַנָּ֤בֶל <sup>5034 </sup> <n>wither</n> כֶּֽעָלֶה֙ <sup>5929 </sup> <n>as a leaf</n> כֻּלָּ֔נוּ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> וַעֲוֹנֵ֖נוּ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>and our iniquities</n> כָּר֥וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>like the wind</n> יִשָּׂאֻֽנוּ׃ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>have taken us away</n>
7: וְאֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>There</n> קוֹרֵ֣א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>And [there is] none that calleth</n> בְשִׁמְךָ֔ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>upon thy name</n> מִתְעוֹרֵ֖ר <sup>5782 </sup> <n>that stirreth up</n> לְהַחֲזִ֣יק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>himself to take hold</n> בָּ֑ךְ כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הִסְתַּ֤רְתָּ <sup>5641 </sup> <n>of thee for thou hast hid</n> פָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>thy face</n> מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>and hast</n> וַתְּמוּגֵ֖נוּ <sup>4127 </sup> <n>from us and hast consumed</n> בְּיַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>us because</n> עֲוֹנֵֽנוּ׃ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>of our iniquities</n>
8: וְעַתָּ֥ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> אָבִ֣ינוּ <sup>1 </sup> <n>thou [art] our father</n> אָ֑תָּה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> אֲנַ֤חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n> הַחֹ֙מֶר֙ <sup>2563 </sup> <n>we [are] the clay</n> וְאַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>and You</n> יֹצְרֵ֔נוּ <sup>3335 </sup> <n>and thou our potter</n> וּמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <sup>4639 </sup> <n>and we all [are] the work</n> יָדְךָ֖ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of thy hand</n> כֻּלָּֽנוּ׃ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n>
9: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּקְצֹ֤ף <sup>7107 </sup> <n>Be not wroth</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>beyond</n> מְאֹ֔ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>very sore</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> לָעַ֖ד <sup>5703 </sup> <n>for ever</n> תִּזְכֹּ֣ר <sup>2142 </sup> <n>neither remember</n> עָוֹ֑ן <sup>5771 </sup> <n>iniquity</n> הֵ֥ן <sup>2005 </sup> <n>Behold</n> הַבֶּט־ <sup>5027 </sup> <n>behold see</n> נָ֖א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>now</n> עַמְּךָ֥ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>we beseech thee we [are] all thy people</n> כֻלָּֽנוּ׃ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n>
10: עָרֵ֥י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> קָדְשְׁךָ֖ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>Thy holy</n> הָי֣וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have become</n> מִדְבָּ֑ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>are a wilderness</n> צִיּוֹן֙ <sup>6726 </sup> <n>Zion</n> מִדְבָּ֣ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>is a wilderness</n> הָיָ֔תָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has become</n> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>Jerusalem</n> שְׁמָמָֽה׃ <sup>8077 </sup> <n>a desolation</n>
11: בֵּ֧ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> קָדְשֵׁ֣נוּ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>Our holy</n> וְתִפְאַרְתֵּ֗נוּ <sup>8597 </sup> <n>and our beautiful</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>Where</n> הִֽלְל֙וּךָ֙ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>praised</n> אֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <sup>1 </sup> <n>where our fathers</n> הָיָ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has been</n> לִשְׂרֵ֣פַת <sup>8316 </sup> <n>thee is burned up</n> אֵ֑שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>with fire</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> מַחֲמַדֵּ֖ינוּ <sup>4261 </sup> <n>and all our pleasant things</n> הָיָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have become</n> לְחָרְבָּֽה׃ <sup>2723 </sup> <n>are laid waste</n>
12: הַעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>at</n> אֵ֥לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> תִתְאַפַּ֖ק <sup>662 </sup> <n>Wilt thou refrain</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>Jehovah</n> תֶּחֱשֶׁ֥ה <sup>2814 </sup> <n>silent</n> וּתְעַנֵּ֖נוּ <sup>6031 </sup> <n>and afflict</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>beyond</n> מְאֹֽד׃ <sup>3966 </sup> <n>diligently</n> ס
